akn:section.akn:heading: Tax credit to Qualified High Technology Companies for wages to qualified disadvantaged employees.

akn:content.akn:p: Except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, for taxable years beginning after December 31, 2000, a Qualified High Technology Company shall be allowed a credit against the tax imposed by ยง 47-1817.06 equal to 50% of the wages paid to a qualified disadvantaged employee, as defined in ยง 47-1817.04, during the first 24 calendar months of employment.
The credit under subsection (a) of this section shall not be allowed:
If the amount of the credit allowable under this section exceeds the tax otherwise due from a Qualified High Technology Company, the unused amount of the credit may be carried forward for 10 years.
